metadata.title: CVE-2020-1763 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds buffer read flaw was found in the pluto daemon oflibreswan from versions 3.27 till 3.31 where, an unauthenticated attackercould use this flaw to crash libreswan by sending specially-crafted IKEv1Informational Exchange packets. The daemon respawns after the crash.

criterions.comment: libreswan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
